sentence.Network_en: Tougher sentences are being handed down these days.

sentence.Network_en: These diamonds have been handed down in his family for generations.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些钻石在他家已经传了好几代.

sentence.Network_en: This necklace has been handed down in my family.
sentence.Network_cn: 这串项链是我家祖上传下来的.
